april.vis
Class VisCanvas

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              april.vis.VisCanvas
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class VisCanvas
extends javax.swing.JComponent

A VisCanvas coordinates the rendering and event handling for a collection of VisLayers in a single JComponent.

See Also:
Serialized Form

movieCreate

public VisCanvas.Movie movieCreate(java.lang.String path,
                                   boolean autoframes)
                            throws java.io.IOException
There are two ways to make movies which differ in when frames are added to the movie. In 'autoframes' mode, every rendered frame is added to the movie. In manual mode, frames are added programmatically by calls to movieAddFrame

Throws:
java.io.IOException

populatePopupMenu
